/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the intersection. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings line the sides of the street, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
